underlying_goal: The user wanted to make the principle of 'truth-seeking' and flagging unexpected results more prominent in the CLAUDE.md documentation.
primary_success: Synthesized divergent advice from multiple simulated agents into a practical solution that balanced prominence with avoiding documentation fragmentation.
brief_summary: User wanted to make the 'truth-seeking' principle more prominent in CLAUDE.md. Claude researched the file's history, simulated a discussion with other agents to get different perspectives, and proposed a synthesized solution. After user approval, Claude implemented the changes by adding the principle to a high-level table and expanding a lower-level section, then committed the work.
